sentences.english: It is imbroglio of feeling's kind And enmity holding up his feet.
sentences.chinese: 是感情的恩恩怨怨的糾葛絆住了腳。

sentences.english: The business world has always been a cauldron of personal animosity, and those animosities have been particularly intense in Silicon Valley.
sentences.chinese: 商業世界從來就不缺個人恩怨，在硅谷尤其如此。

sentences.english: Had M. de Villefort any cause of personal dislike to you?
sentences.chinese: 他對你有沒有什麼私人的恩怨？

sentences.english: We must blot out the personal enmities at this time.
sentences.chinese: 此時我們必須摒棄個人之間的恩怨。

sentences.english: I hope all of us not to hash up old bitterness against one another.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我們誰都不要再提起我們之間的舊恩怨。

sentences.english: Life is too short to turn every personal affront into a battle.
sentences.chinese: 人生苦短，別太過於計較個人恩怨。

sentences.english: Personal grievances or financial inducements will always lure some off the straight and narrow.
sentences.chinese: 個人恩怨或金錢誘惑總是能導致某些人走上邪路。

sentences.english: With so much at stake both sets of players made nervy starts.
sentences.chinese: 帶着這麼多恩恩怨怨，兩邊隊員開場都很謹慎。

sentences.english: The list of policy proposals (and personal vendettas) a candidate hopes to accomplish if elected.
sentences.chinese: 政策提案加個人恩怨清單，候選人希望當選後實施。

sentences.english: I'm not getting involved in your personal vendettas .
sentences.chinese: 我沒有牽扯到你們的私人恩怨裏。

sentences.english: The problem goes deeper than animosity between two old allies.
sentences.chinese: 問題絕非兩位昔日盟友之間的恩怨這麼簡單。

sentences.english: Looks that their gratitude and grudges the reality performance, the day but is actually not stuffy.
sentences.chinese: 看着他們恩恩怨怨的現實表演，日子倒也不悶。

sentences.english: Gaines says that the people involved wanted to make it personal.
sentences.chinese: 蓋恩斯說，參與此事的人想把這事弄成個人恩怨。

definition: an old grudge/old scores to settle
debt of gratitude coupled with duty to avenge
